translations: 研磨；思索或思考某事物；使醉

sentences.sentence: I need some time to mull it over before making a decision.
sentences.translation: 在作出决定之前我需要一些时间来认真琢磨一下。

sentences.sentence: Now we shall be able to mull some ale!
sentences.translation: 现在我们可以热一些麦芽酒了！

sentences.sentence: But who has time to mull over things of this nature?
sentences.translation: 但谁会有时间仔细琢磨这种天性之特征呢？
